expensify.title: Expensify app
expensify.description: React app. Connect with firebase. Contains authentication, sorting, adding, deleting and edition our expenses.

smartBrain.title: Face recognition app
smartBrain.description: React app with Node and PosgreSQL. Connect with Clarifai API responsible for detecting faces on pictures. Supports only first hit so if you add picture url where is more faces than one app still frame only one face. Contains authentication.
